lst.str: Partially funded with a 6.5 mln dlr award made through the Agriculture Department's Targeted Export Assistance (TEA) program, a five-year meat promotion campaign in Japan was launched by the U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: U.S. beef sales to Japan, currently around 480 mln dlrs annually, could increase to over two billion dlrs and as high as six billion dlrs by the year 2000 if Japanese quotas were removed and the Japanese consumer were made more aware of the attributes of U.
